107 std::array<double,3> LevelSetObject::computeProjectionPoint(long i) const{
108  double value = getLS(i);
109  if(utils::DoubleFloatingEqual()(value,levelSetDefaults::VALUE)){
110  return levelSetDefaults::POINT;
111  }
112 
113  return m_kernelPtr->computeCellCentroid(i) -value *getGradient(i);
114 }
115 
121 std::array<double,3> LevelSetObject::computeProjectionPoint(const std::array<double,3> &coords) const{
122 
123  LevelSetInfo info = computeLevelSetInfo(coords);
124  return coords -info.value *info.gradient;
125 }
126 
132 std::array<double,3> LevelSetObject::computeVertexProjectionPoint(long vertexId) const{
133 
134  const std::array<double,3> &coords = m_kernelPtr->getVertexCoords(vertexId);
135  return computeProjectionPoint(coords);
136 }

178 bool LevelSetObject::isInNarrowBand(long i)const{
179  assert( m_narrowBand > 0 && "Need to set size of narrow >0 before calling isInNarrowBand");
180  return ( std::abs(getLS(i)) <= m_narrowBand );
181 }

205 
233 LevelSetIntersectionStatus LevelSetObject::intersectSurface(long i, LevelSetIntersectionMode mode) const{
234 
235  double incircle, circumcircle;
236 
237  switch(mode){
238  case LevelSetIntersectionMode::FAST_GUARANTEE_TRUE:
239  {
240  incircle = m_kernelPtr->computeCellIncircle(i) ;
241  if(std::abs(getLS(i)) <= incircle){
242  return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::TRUE;
243  } else {
244  return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::FALSE;
245  }
246 
247  break;
248  }
249 
250  case LevelSetIntersectionMode::FAST_GUARANTEE_FALSE:
251  {
252  circumcircle = m_kernelPtr->computeCellCircumcircle(i) ;
253  if(std::abs(getLS(i)) > circumcircle){
254  return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::FALSE;
255  } else {
256  return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::TRUE;
257  }
258 
259  break;
260  }
261 
262  case LevelSetIntersectionMode::FAST_FUZZY:
263  {
264  circumcircle = m_kernelPtr->computeCellCircumcircle(i) ;
265  if(std::abs(getLS(i)) > circumcircle){
266  return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::FALSE;
267  }
268 
269  incircle = m_kernelPtr->computeCellIncircle(i) ;
270  if(std::abs(getLS(i)) <= incircle){
271  return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::TRUE;
272  }
273 
274  return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::CLOSE;
275 
276  break;
277  }
278 
279  case LevelSetIntersectionMode::ACCURATE:
280  {
281  circumcircle = m_kernelPtr->computeCellCircumcircle(i) ;
282  if(std::abs(getLS(i)) > circumcircle){
283  return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::FALSE;
284  }
285 
286  incircle = m_kernelPtr->computeCellIncircle(i) ;
287  if(std::abs(getLS(i)) <= incircle){
288  return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::TRUE;
289  }
290 
291  std::array<double,3> root = computeProjectionPoint(i);
292  std::array<double,3> normal = getGradient(i);
293  if( m_kernelPtr->intersectCellPlane(i,root,normal) ){
294  return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::TRUE;
295  } else {
296  return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::FALSE;
297  }
298 
299  break;
300  }
301  }
302 
303  BITPIT_UNREACHABLE("cannot reach");
304 
305 }

413 void LevelSetObject::enableVTKOutput( LevelSetWriteField writeField, bool enable) {
414 
415  std::vector<LevelSetWriteField> fields;
416 
417  if( writeField==LevelSetWriteField::ALL){
418  fields.push_back(LevelSetWriteField::VALUE);
419  fields.push_back(LevelSetWriteField::GRADIENT);
420  fields.push_back(LevelSetWriteField::NORMAL);
421  fields.push_back(LevelSetWriteField::PART);
422 
423  } else if ( writeField==LevelSetWriteField::DEFAULT){
424  fields.push_back(LevelSetWriteField::VALUE);
425  fields.push_back(LevelSetWriteField::GRADIENT);
426 
427  } else {
428  fields.push_back(writeField);
429  }
430 
431  for( LevelSetWriteField &field : fields){
432 
433  std::stringstream name;
434  name << "ls_";
435  name << getId();
436  name << "_";
437 
438 
439  switch(field){
440  case LevelSetWriteField::VALUE:
441  name << "value";
442  if(enable){
443  m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getVTK().addData<double>( name.str(), VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
444  } else {
445  m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getVTK().removeData( name.str());
446  }
447  break;
448 
449  case LevelSetWriteField::GRADIENT:
450  name << "gradient";
451  if(enable){
452  m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getVTK().addData<double>( name.str(), VTKFieldType::VECTOR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
453  } else {
454  m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getVTK().removeData( name.str());
455  }
456  break;
457 
458  case LevelSetWriteField::NORMAL:
459  name << "normal";
460  if(enable){
461  m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getVTK().addData<double>( name.str(), VTKFieldType::VECTOR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
462  } else {
463  m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getVTK().removeData( name.str());
464  }
465  break;
466 
467  case LevelSetWriteField::PART:
468  name << "partId";
469  if(enable){
470  m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getVTK().addData<int>( name.str(), VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
471  } else {
472  m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getVTK().removeData( name.str());
473  }
474  break;
475 
476  default:
477  throw std::runtime_error ("Unsupported value of field in LevelSetObject::addDataToVTK() ");
478  break;
479 
480  }
481  }
482 
483 }
484 
494 void LevelSetObject::flushData( std::fstream &stream, const std::string &name, VTKFormat format){
495 
496 
497  if(utils::string::keywordInString(name,"value")){
498 
499  void (*writeFunctionPtr)(std::fstream &, const double &) = nullptr;
500 
501  if(format==VTKFormat::APPENDED){
502  writeFunctionPtr = genericIO::flushBINARY<double>;
503  } else if(format==VTKFormat::ASCII){
504  writeFunctionPtr = genericIO::flushASCII<double>;
505  } else {
506  BITPIT_UNREACHABLE("Non-existent VTK format.");
507  }
508 
509  for( const Cell &cell : m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getVTKCellWriteRange() ){
510  long cellId = cell.getId();
511  double value = getLS(cellId);
512  (*writeFunctionPtr)(stream,value);
513  }
514 
515  } else if( utils::string::keywordInString(name,"gradient")){
516 
517  void (*writeFunctionPtr)(std::fstream &, const std::array<double,3> &) = nullptr;
518 
519  if(format==VTKFormat::APPENDED){
520  writeFunctionPtr = genericIO::flushBINARY<std::array<double,3>>;
521  } else if(format==VTKFormat::ASCII){
522  writeFunctionPtr = genericIO::flushASCII<std::array<double,3>>;
523  } else {
524  BITPIT_UNREACHABLE("Non-existent VTK format.");
525  }
526 
527  for( const Cell &cell : m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getVTKCellWriteRange() ){
528  long cellId = cell.getId();
529  const std::array<double,3> &value = getGradient(cellId);
530  (*writeFunctionPtr)(stream,value);
531  }
532 
533  } else if( utils::string::keywordInString(name,"normal")){
534 
535  void (*writeFunctionPtr)(std::fstream &, const std::array<double,3> &) = nullptr;
536 
537  if(format==VTKFormat::APPENDED){
538  writeFunctionPtr = genericIO::flushBINARY<std::array<double,3>>;
539  } else if(format==VTKFormat::ASCII){
540  writeFunctionPtr = genericIO::flushASCII<std::array<double,3>>;
541  } else {
542  BITPIT_UNREACHABLE("Non-existent VTK format.");
543  }
544 
545  for( const Cell &cell : m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getVTKCellWriteRange() ){
546  long cellId = cell.getId();
547  const std::array<double,3> &value = getNormal(cellId);
548  (*writeFunctionPtr)(stream,value);
549  }
550 
551  } else if( utils::string::keywordInString(name,"part")){
552 
553  void (*writeFunctionPtr)(std::fstream &, const int &) = nullptr;
554 
555  if(format==VTKFormat::APPENDED){
556  writeFunctionPtr = genericIO::flushBINARY<int>;
557  } else if(format==VTKFormat::ASCII){
558  writeFunctionPtr = genericIO::flushASCII<int>;
559  } else {
560  BITPIT_UNREACHABLE("Non-existent VTK format.");
561  }
562 
563  for( const Cell &cell : m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getVTKCellWriteRange() ){
564  long cellId = cell.getId();
565  int value = getPart(cellId);
566  (*writeFunctionPtr)(stream,value);
567  }
568  }
569 }

584 void LevelSetObject::exchangeGhosts(){
585 
586  const std::unordered_map<int,std::vector<long>> &sendList = m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getGhostCellExchangeSources() ;
587  const std::unordered_map<int,std::vector<long>> &recvList = m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->getGhostCellExchangeTargets() ;
588 
589  communicate(sendList,recvList);
590 }
591 
599 void LevelSetObject::communicate( const std::unordered_map<int,std::vector<long>> &sendList,
600  const std::unordered_map<int,std::vector<long>> &recvList,
601  std::vector<adaption::Info> const *mapper){
602 
603  if (!m_kernelPtr->getMesh()->isPartitioned()) {
604  return;
605  }
606 
607  // Create a data communicator
608  MPI_Comm meshComm = m_kernelPtr->getCommunicator() ;
609  DataCommunicator dataCommunicator(meshComm) ;
610 
611  // Fill the send buffer with the content from the LevelSetObject base
612  // class and the specific derived class.
613  for (const auto &entry : sendList) {
614  // Create an empty send
615  int rank = entry.first;
616  dataCommunicator.setSend(rank, 0);
617 
618  // Write data in the buffer
619  SendBuffer &buffer = dataCommunicator.getSendBuffer(rank);
620  writeCommunicationBuffer(entry.second, buffer);
621  }
622 
623  // Discover the receives
624  dataCommunicator.discoverRecvs();
625 
626  // Start the sends
627  dataCommunicator.startAllRecvs();
628 
629  // In case of mesh adaption, the ids of the moved items must be freed
630  // in order to avoid conflicts when ids are recycled
631  if (mapper) {
632  clearAfterMeshAdaption(*mapper);
633  }
634 
635  // Start the sends
636  dataCommunicator.startAllSends();
637 
638  // Check which data communications have arrived. For those which are
639  // available start reading the databuffer into the data structure of
640  // LevelSetObject and its derived classes.
641  int nCompletedRecvs = 0;
642  while (nCompletedRecvs < dataCommunicator.getRecvCount()) {
643  int rank = dataCommunicator.waitAnyRecv();
644 
645  RecvBuffer &dataBuffer = dataCommunicator.getRecvBuffer(rank);
646  readCommunicationBuffer(recvList.at(rank), dataBuffer);
647 
648  ++nCompletedRecvs;
649  }
650 
651  dataCommunicator.waitAllSends();
652  dataCommunicator.finalize();
653 }
654 
660 void LevelSetObject::writeCommunicationBuffer( const std::vector<long> &sendList, SendBuffer &dataBuffer ){
661  _writeCommunicationBuffer( sendList, dataBuffer) ;
662  dataBuffer.squeeze( ) ;
663 }
